file_intent: Lightweight client-side form validation rules engine (minified).

responsibility_blocks.description: Exposes FormValidator constructor/functions as a UMD module accessible in different environments.
responsibility_blocks.label: Public API surface and module export

responsibility_blocks.description: Defines core built-in validation rules (required, email, minLength, maxLength, numeric, pattern) and their predicate logic.
responsibility_blocks.label: Validation rule definitions

responsibility_blocks.description: Applies provided rules to input fields; aggregates errors per field; returns overall validity and error details.
responsibility_blocks.label: Runtime validation function

responsibility_blocks.description: Allows adding new rules or overriding existing ones at runtime via addRule and rules exposure.
responsibility_blocks.label: Rule registration and extension mechanism

responsibility_blocks.description: Formats the validation outcome into an object { valid, errors } and includes per-field messages.
responsibility_blocks.label: Result construction
